reviews.text: One of the approximately 1300 Jewish cemeteries in Hungary. The place is well maintaned, easy to find, it is open as a rule, except Saturdays.
There's a guy living there and will let you in just have to ring the bell, in addition he helped us get a taxi to get back  it's a must visit if your in the area
Beautiful old cemetery. Only by appointment!
Not enough toilettes but the location is cool
Great postindustrial place for Concerts convents exhibitions. No lift for handicapped persons.
Great gallery. Communities are needing a spaces like this.
Very good place for beer festival, but there could be a lot more place to sit. Setting low score until its fixed.

It is basically an old warehouse adopted to be a gallery an a place for events. I have visited a vegetarian festival here and I enjoyed it quite a bit. It is spacious, at the entrance I have seen some really great art and photos of an old and new locations made up in one holographic magic. I didn't like wierd uneven floors and small confusing parking surrounded by rubbish and other debris.
Simply delicious, and plenty to choose from
#tasty
Nice. Delicious food

Buffet style.You pay for the weight of the food,so it's cheap but the quality is good.Rather busy.Food is fresh and not sitting on a steamer for too long.Good location,near railway station. Free wifi:)

I have mixed feelings regarding the food. The salad and pierogis were amazing, the chicken, meat were insipid and the fish tasted like old or expired. The prices are average, a bit higher than others buffets but cheaper than other restaurants in this zone.

Very good quality. The food they're serving is always fresh, natural, but...  Maybe it depends on a particular person's taste, but the taste of the food greatly varies. F.ex. great crepes with red bean paste, but their Asian pasta is only passable and bland. My suggestion would be: go there, ask for a recommendation and inquire about the plate you're interested in.

Yummy comfort food on a rainy night. Tremendous variety of veg foods plus a reasonable salad bar. Here during COP24 so v busy around 5:30pm, plus lots of locals taking getting take-out. Portions are large and prices are v reasonable too. 😋

Prices are low and food is nice, but not for everyone - different dishes have different quality. I was especially disappointed with salad bar. Place is overcrowded - especially that a lot of people comes just to get takeaway. You can come with dog here. Service is nice. A lot to improve, but overall nice place. I would give 3,5/5⭐ but I can't ;)
I love this place! Don't be put off if all the tables are taken just ask if you can join someone! The food is  fantastic, I've eaten here a dozen times and never had a bad meal.
The best vegan/vegetarian food l ever tried) Great test and so many different dishes to choose!

The restaurant is located in Monaco and very easy to find. The moment I entered it, I was fascinated by the atmosphere and decoration. We were a group of three and had reserved a table online. Sadly, one part of the menu did not have an English version, but the friendly waitress explained everything in fluent English (which is not expectable in France!). We ordered the lunch set menu and were very satisfied by the chef‘s creations. The combinations were wonderful abd supported the taste.
I‘d like to note that a reservation is highly recommended, eventhough the process might be a little complicated. I can understand that no-shows are irritating, but having customers depositing their credit card for a cancellation fee of 150€ in case late modification of the booking or no-show is an overreaction in my opinion. I think the restaurant should trust customers for calling in advance, if they no they cannot show up.
I had a great time with my hubby and really like the atmosphere

Utterly disoppinted with the level of service and communication level at the reservations and no one was on the floor to recieve us to lead us to the table.  The person on the phone taking the reservations was highly rude when we arrived at the recieption  and we were asked to remove our blazzers which she confused with a fur over coat. the staff needs a lot of training with soft skills and specially english speaking skills.
I don't understand why everyone is crazy over the sushi here. It tastes like a sushi place at a train station in Japan. Everything else is good though
This place is opens 2 times in week... Thursday and Friday... Went there twice both times was closed... Locals did not considered it as good bar...
Nachos has no taste.. Served by sauce chilli, awful sauce... I would call it water... Good place but bad cook

Food was delicious and service was great. Though, the place closed earlier than advertised due to Holidays I am guessing. Wish the menu was more expansive than just pizza and burgers mostly but what City Rock does have is always quality.
Unbelievably cheap and tasty food in the daytime.
Thank you wery wery much, your Chiken is splended and atmospher wery lovebulle, strong recomendanding strong
Good pizza and burger place, but not best in Kato
Modern, clean and a luxury atmosphere. The people who workntjere does a great job and the food is superb. It's a fancy restaurant with low prices :)
Both the cutlery and the table were dirty. I waited 50 minutes for my dish and it came with a human hair in it. Cheap but would not recommend.
Stunning food ! Delightful wine ! Perfect service ! Superb restaurant ! Classic place in Kato ! :)

Such a surprise this place :) food was delicious - we tried fish soup, goulash with galushki and budapest style tenderloin - they were really good, we did not expect so good prepared :)
Nice and good offer Hungarian wines as well.
Waiter was nice and kind.
 Comparing the price and quality was are really good choice.
For sure we will be back :)
Delicious food. Spicy and full of taste
Big tables. Much space. Even with a big group, all got their food nearly at the same time.
Frequently updated menu. Best hladinka in town
Awful staff. Wouldn’t let us sit by the window in an empty restaurant because the table was for 4 people not 2.
Good food good drinks good mood

Excellent food in a 'raw' interior styled large-yet-cozy restaurant. Beer is beverage of choice, as advertised by the copper kettles featured in the window. Great steak, and acceptable burrata. Bread with (local) condiments.
Has a nice celebration hall. Good service but the food could improve.
Nice spacy rooms, beautiful hotel restaurant and a horror house atmosphere in the hallways.

Really awesome hotel with a great vibe good beers and a nice pizzaria not too far away.

I enjoyed my stay except rhat there was a late night party. But we actually got a notice about that a month before the stay and were told we could cancel for free if it was inconvenient.

Oh and: ENCE!! ENCE!! ENCE!!
Nice place, Very characteristic. The food is also nice.
Nice place to stay in that region.
